Terms of Sale

Please read these terms carefully before purchasing.

1. Custom/Made-to-Order Products

All prints sold through Archive-35 are custom, made-to-order products. Each print is produced specifically for you after your order is placed. Production begins immediately upon payment confirmation.

Due to the custom nature of these products, the Consumer Protection (Distance Selling) Regulations right to cancellation does not apply.

2. Art Is Subjective — All Sales Final

All sales are final. No returns or refunds.

Photography is a form of fine art. By its nature, the appreciation of art is subjective — what resonates deeply with one person may not appeal to another. By completing your purchase, you acknowledge and accept that:

  • Aesthetic preference is not grounds for a return. Dissatisfaction based on personal taste, style, mood, or subjective visual preference does not qualify for a refund or exchange.
  • Color variations between your screen and the physical print are normal and expected (see Section 4 below)
  • Print dimensions are clearly displayed before purchase — size dissatisfaction is not grounds for a return
  • Incorrect product or size selection by the customer is not grounds for a return
  • Change of mind or buyer's remorse after receiving the print is not grounds for a return

We encourage you to carefully review all product details, dimensions, and material descriptions before placing your order. If you have any questions about a specific photograph or print option, please contact us before purchasing.

3. Damaged or Defective Prints — The Only Exception

If your print arrives damaged during shipping or has a manufacturing defect, we will work with our print fulfillment partner to replace it at no charge. To qualify for a replacement:

  • Notify us within 30 days of delivery via our contact form
  • Provide clear photographs of the damage or defect AND the original packaging
  • Do not discard the packaging until the claim is fully resolved
  • Damage must be shipping-related or a manufacturing defect — not handling damage after delivery

Our prints are produced by Pictorem, a professional fine art print fulfillment provider. Pictorem guarantees their print quality and will replace any print with a verified manufacturing defect. We reserve the right to deny claims that do not meet these requirements or where evidence of the defect is insufficient.

4. Color & Display Disclaimer

Images displayed on this website are for reference only. Actual print colors may vary from what you see on your screen due to:

  • Monitor calibration and color profile differences
  • Ambient lighting conditions when viewing your screen
  • Display technology variations (LCD, OLED, etc.)
  • Print substrate characteristics (canvas texture, metal sheen, etc.)

We use professional color management in our printing process, but slight variations are normal and expected. Color variation is not grounds for a refund.

5. Production & Delivery Times

All prints are handcrafted by our professional print partner. Typical production times:

  • Canvas prints: 5-7 business days
  • Fine Art Paper prints: 5-7 business days
  • Metal prints: 10-14 business days
  • Acrylic prints: 10-14 business days
  • Wood prints: 10-14 business days

Shipping: Free ground shipping to USA and Canada (5-9 additional business days). International shipping available upon request.

Total delivery time: Please allow 2-4 weeks from order to arrival. Production and shipping times are estimates and not guaranteed. Delays may occur due to high demand, holidays, or circumstances beyond our control.

6. Copyright & Usage Rights

All images displayed on this website and sold as prints are copyrighted by Archive-35 and/or Wolf Schram. Purchase of a print grants you the following limited rights:

  • Personal display: You may display the physical print in your home or office for personal, non-commercial enjoyment.

You may NOT:

  • Reproduce, scan, or photograph the print for reproduction purposes
  • Create derivative works from the print
  • Use the image for commercial purposes without a separate license
  • Resell digital copies or reproductions of the image
  • Claim ownership of the underlying photograph

Commercial licensing is available separately. Please contact us for licensing inquiries.

7. Payment & Security

All payments are processed securely through Stripe. We do not store your credit card information. By completing a purchase, you authorize us to charge your payment method for the total amount shown at checkout.

Prices are in US Dollars (USD) and include free shipping to USA and Canada. International orders may incur additional shipping charges.

8. Limitation of Liability

Archive-35's maximum liability for any claim related to your purchase shall not exceed the purchase price you paid for the specific item in question.

We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including but not limited to:

  • Lost profits or revenue
  • Loss of data or information
  • Emotional distress
  • Delays in delivery
  • Any damages arising from circumstances beyond our reasonable control

9. Dispute Resolution

If you have a concern about your order, please contact us first through our contact form. We will make reasonable efforts to resolve any issues. Any disputes that cannot be resolved informally shall be subject to the laws of the State of Texas, United States.

10. Modifications to Terms

We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Sale at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting to this page. Your continued use of our website and services after changes are posted constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

11. Print Fulfillment

All prints are produced and shipped by Pictorem (www.pictorem.com), a professional fine art print fulfillment service based in North America. Archive-35 is not directly responsible for printing or shipping, but we work closely with Pictorem to ensure quality standards are met. Any quality issues will be handled through our replacement process described in Section 3.

12. Agreement

By completing your purchase, you explicitly acknowledge and agree that:

  • You have read and understood these Terms of Sale in their entirety
  • You understand that photography is subjective art and that aesthetic dissatisfaction is not grounds for a return
  • You accept that all sales are final, with the sole exception of damaged or defective prints
  • You accept that color variations between screen and print are normal

Your payment and acceptance of the Terms checkbox at checkout constitutes a binding agreement to these terms.

Last updated: February 7, 2026
